abstract: In a move that has been rumored for weeks, is was confirmed on Tuesday that Barry Weiss, a top executive at Sony Music Entertainment, has signed a new deal with Universal Music Group.
snippet: In a move that has been rumored for weeks, is was confirmed on Tuesday that Barry Weiss, a top executive at Sony Music Entertainment, has signed a new deal with Universal Music Group.
lead_paragraph: 2:02 p.m. | Updated In a shift of power among the major record companies, Barry Weiss, a top executive at Sony Music Entertainment, has signed a new deal with Universal Music Group, the industry leader and Sony’s chief competitor.

headline.main: Barry Weiss Joins Universal Music Group
